Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-49767 affecting package python-werkzeug for versions less than 2.3.7-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-49767 affecting package python-werkzeug for versions less than 2.3.7-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-werkzeug is earlier than 2.3.7-3, affected by CVE-2024-49767
